startPage.title: Start page
startPage.description: Which result page to start from (1-based).

maxResultsPages.title: How many result pages to crawl
maxResultsPages.description: How many search result pages to crawl (pagination depth).

location.title: City/Region
location.description: City/region to search agents for (e.g., "Jacksonville, FL").

goOnePageDeep.title: Visit profiles (1 page deep)
goOnePageDeep.description: Visit each found agent profile (one page deep) to extract details.

outputCsv.title: Output CSV filename
outputCsv.description: Filename for the Brevo-ready CSV to generate.
